data.comment: The match has started at Estadio Municipal de Portimao.
Throw-in for Portimonense in the half of Nacional.
In the minute 2, Ball goes out of play for a Nacional goal kick.
Ball safe as Portimonense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Portimonense have been awarded a corner by Gustavo Correia.
In the minute 4, Fabricio for Portimonense gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Gustavo Correia awards Nacional a goal kick.
Throw-in for Nacional in their own half.
In the minute 5, Nacional's Brayan Riascos gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Portimonense defender.
Gustavo Correia signals a Nacional throw-in in Portimonense's half.
Portimonense are coming forward and Fabricio gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 7, Goal kick for Nacional at Estadio Municipal de Portimao.
Free kick for Nacional in the half of Portimonense.
Gustavo Correia signals a free kick to Portimonense in their own half.
In the minute 9, Can Portimonense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nacional's half?
Portimonense's Luquinha gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Nacional have a goal kick.
In the minute 11, Portimonense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Gustavo Correia signals a free kick to Nacional just outside Portimonense's area.
Gustavo Correia signals a free kick to Portimonense.
In the minute 14, It's a goal kick for the away team in Portimao.
Free kick for Portimonense in their own half.
Free kick for Nacional in their own half.
In the minute 15, In Portimao a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick Nacional.
In Portimao a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 18, Gustavo Correia awards the away team a throw-in.
Nacional to take a throw-in in Portimonense territory.
The match at Estadio Municipal de Portimao has been interrupted briefly for a check on Ruben Freitas, who is down injured.
In the minute 20, Luis Freire (Nacional) has taken off Ruben Freitas who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Mabrouk Rouai is the replacement.
In Portimao, Anderson de Oliveira da Silva (Portimonense) misses the target with a header.
Goal kick for Nacional at Estadio Municipal de Portimao.
In the minute 23, Portimonense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Gustavo Correia signals a free kick to Nacional in their own half.
Portimonense awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 25, In Portimao Nacional attack through Brayan Riascos. The finish is off target, however.
Portimonense have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Nacional at Estadio Municipal de Portimao.
In the minute 27, Gustavo Correia awards Portimonense a goal kick.
Nacional push forward at Estadio Municipal de Portimao and Ruben Micael gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Portimonense defence.
Throw-in Portimonense.
In the minute 30, Throw-in high up the field for Portimonense in Portimao.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Portimao.
In the minute 34, Corner awarded to Nacional.
Ball goes out of play for a Portimonense goal kick.
Free kick for Nacional in their own half.
In the minute 36, Ball goes out of play for a Nacional goal kick.
Portimonense have been awarded a corner by Gustavo Correia.
Can Nacional capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 36, Portimonense's Dener has been booked in Portimao.
Goal kick for Portimonense at Estadio Municipal de Portimao.
Free kick Nacional.
In the minute 38, Free kick for Nacional in the half of Portimonense.
Corner awarded to Nacional.
Nacional to take a throw-in in Portimonense territory.
In the minute 40, Portimonense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Nacional at Estadio Municipal de Portimao.
Gustavo Correia awards Nacional a goal kick.
In the minute 44, Nacional have a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Portimao.
2 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Portimao.
In the minute 45, Portimonense's Pedro Sa breaks free at Estadio Municipal de Portimao. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Gustavo Correia awards Nacional a goal kick.
In the minute 45, Abdullahi Ibrahim Alhassan is back on the pitch.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Portimonense in their own half.
In the minute 45, Can Nacional get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Portimonense's half?
Gustavo Correia awards the home team a throw-in.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
Abdullahi Ibrahim Alhassan is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 46, Gustavo Correia has blown to start the second-half.
Ball safe as Nacional is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Nacional are pushing forward but Mabrouk Rouai's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 48, It's a goal kick for the home team in Portimao.
Portimonense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Portimonense are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 50, Portimonense have been awarded a corner by Gustavo Correia.
Gustavo Correia signals a Nacional throw-in in Portimonense's half.
Nacional have a goal kick.
In the minute 53, Throw-in for Nacional close to the penalty box.
Ruben Micael for Nacional gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Portimonense at Estadio Municipal de Portimao.
In the minute 54, Portimonense's Pedro Sa misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Nacional goal kick.
Corner awarded to Portimonense.
In the minute 55, Portimonense's Pedro Sa attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Nacional goal kick.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Samuel for Portimonense who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 57, Corner awarded to Portimonense.
Samuel has recovered and rejoins the match in Portimao.
Gustavo Correia signals a free kick to Nacional.
In the minute 59, Nacional needs to be cautious. Portimonense have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in Nacional.
In Portimao a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Gustavo Correia signals a free kick to Nacional in their own half.
In the minute 62, Luquinha (Portimonense) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Portimonense have been awarded a corner by Gustavo Correia.
In the minute 63, Goal kick for Nacional at Estadio Municipal de Portimao.
Luis Freire is making the team's second substitution at Estadio Municipal de Portimao with Kenji Gorre replacing Joao Victor.
Nacional make their third substitution with Vladan Danilovic replacing Vincent Koziello.
In the minute 65, Free kick for Nacional in their own half.
Portimonense have a goal kick.
Gustavo Correia awards the away team a throw-in.
Nacional will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Portimonense.
In the minute 68, Ricardo Vaz Te is replacing Luquinha for the home team.
Can Portimonense capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Nacional's half?
In the minute 70, Throw-in for Nacional at Estadio Municipal de Portimao.
Throw-in Nacional.
Ball safe as Nacional is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 71, Portimonense's Lucas gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Gustavo Correia awards Nacional a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Nacional.
In the minute 73, Gustavo Correia signals a throw-in for Nacional, close to Portimonense's area.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Portimao.
Nacional awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 75, Portimonense have been awarded a corner by Gustavo Correia.
Gustavo Correia signals a free kick to Nacional in their own half.
Gustavo Correia signals a free kick to Nacional in their own half.
In the minute 77, Ruben Micael of Nacional gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Portimonense goal kick.
In the minute 78, Nacional awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Nacional in their own half.
The home team replace Julio Cesar with Welinton Junior.
Julio Cesar (Nacional) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 78, Aylton Boa Morte is on a sub for Anderson de Oliveira da Silva for Portimonense.
Nacional awarded a free kick in their own half.
Bryan Rochez is on a sub for Ruben Micael for Nacional.
Portimonense have a goal kick.
Free kick for Portimonense in the half of Nacional.
In the minute 81, Nacional make their fifth substitution with Joao Vigario replacing Lucas Kal.
In the minute 83, Goal kick for Nacional at Estadio Municipal de Portimao.
Gustavo Correia signals a free kick to Portimonense in their own half.
At Estadio Municipal de Portimao, Pedro Sa has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Portimonense have been given a penalty...
In the minute 89, At Estadio Municipal de Portimao, Julio Cesar has been booked for the second time in this match. An early shower is now waiting!
8 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Gustavo Correia signals a free kick to Portimonense.
Gustavo Correia awards Portimonense a goal kick.
Free kick in a good position for Portimonense!
Pedro Sa of Portimonense gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Portimao.
Throw-in for Portimonense in the half of Nacional.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Portimonense close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Nacional in their own half.
The match has come to a close in Portimao. The final score is 1-0.
Goal! Fabricio gives Portimonense a 1-0 lead from the penalty spot.
The home team have replaced Fabricio with Willyan Rocha. This is the third substitution made today by Paulo Sergio.
